scripts.dev: npx nodemon --exec "rm -rf chrome/*.js chrome/*.html chrome/*.css &&cp *.js *.html *.css *.png ./chrome && rm -rf dist/* && sleep 2 &&  zip -r dist/artifact_firefox.zip . && cd chrome && zip -r ../dist/artifact_chrome.zip . && cd .. "  --ignore chrome --ignore dist --ignore *.zip    --watch ./ --ext js,html,css,json
